channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (6 Nov 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-06/#comment-210">Susan Ramsey</a>.
Pleasure, the site looks great. Love the look of Workstation Pro, I just need to have a proper play with it!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susan Ramsey.

Pleasure, the site looks great. Love the look of Workstation Pro, I just need to have a proper play with it!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-06/#comment-211">Kristie Hill</a>.
Thanks Kristie!

item.title: By: Kristie Hill
item.dc:creator: Kristie Hill
item.description: Fact: this has become one of my favorite series to read. Thanks for taking the time to organize all things #genesiswp
item.content:encoded: Fact: this has become one of my favorite series to read. Thanks for taking the time to organize all things #genesiswp

item.title: By: Susan Ramsey
item.dc:creator: Susan Ramsey
item.description: Thanks for the mention. I love the flexibility of Workstation Pro, and I'm loving my site redesign with this theme
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the mention. I love the flexibility of Workstation Pro, and I’m loving my site redesign with this theme

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-06/#comment-208">John Lauber</a>.
Pleasure, thanks!

item.title: By: John Lauber
item.dc:creator: John Lauber
item.description: Thanks for including my presentation. Keep up the good work with all things Genesis!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for including my presentation. Keep up the good work with all things Genesis!

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-11-06/#comment-206">Carly</a>.
Thanks Carly, it's my pleasure.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Carly.

Thanks Carly, it’s my pleasure.

item.title: By: Carly
item.dc:creator: Carly
item.description:
Love that freebie theme, I have downloaded it. Can't wait to use it for something!
Thoroughly enjoyed looking through this list, thanks for sharing!
item.content:encoded:
Love that freebie theme, I have downloaded it. Can’t wait to use it for something!

Thoroughly enjoyed looking through this list, thanks for sharing!
